storyInfo: Blaze could become a Rhodes Island elite operator, and Kal'tsit will find out for herself if it's what Blaze wants.

attributes.content: It's no use! The road is blocked up ahead!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: They're coming from that direction as well. This isn't working. We aren't getting anywhere!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That's as far as you go!
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Nowhere to run. Now hand them over!
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Dammit...
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: We can't let them take the Infected! Hold on, I'll take out the hostiles blocking the way upfront. Use the opportunity to break through them!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Hey, don't do it! Come back!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Calm down! This is no time to be a hero!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: That's right! You're injured!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: But—!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: No buts. Ace will come back us up for sure! Don't panic!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: —You got that right!
It's her!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Watch out! Argh, it's damn hot—
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Suddenly it's getting hotter in here. What's going on...? Hold on, what happened to the wall over there and the barricade... They got sliced apart?!
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: That's our backup.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Feeling toasty? Sorry about that. It took me some work to cut these things apart. I might've overdone it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm still learning to control the heat. I'll try harder next time.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That chainsaw... You're with Ace—
attributes.name: Sniper Operator

attributes.content: Thank goodness, it's Blaze!
attributes.name: Medic Operator

attributes.content: Ha, fashionably late.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, here I am!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sorry for keeping you all waiting. It took me a little longer than I expected to deal with the other bad guys. The teams will regroup here soon.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay, let's charge through them. Stick to the plan.
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: How is this even possible? Those barriers were made of some real special stuff! Did she seriously cut right through that?!
attributes.name: Gang Member

attributes.content: Sorry, buddy. Honestly, I didn't expect it to go that well myself. All I did was slicing from top to bottom—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Seriously, we don't have to fight to the death here, right? How about this? You leave my friends alone and let us take the Infected, and you guys get to go unharmed.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I don't want to hurt you if I don't have to.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What a meanie. Just lash out without saying a word? It's really not that hard to talk it out, is it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, there's no talking to these guys. Get ready to break through!
attributes.name: Guard Operator

attributes.content: Got it! Let me raise the temperature a bit more—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: One last thing. I'm really sorry this is how things turned out, and I mean this from the bottom of my heart.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: O-Owww...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ugh, my arm. Oww.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I used that technique I've been working on. I guess I pushed myself a little too far... Hurts so much I thought I broke my arm.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I guess the thrust's a little off? Did I miscalculate? But...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you doing here talking to yourself?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oh... It's you, Weedy. You spooked me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, you spooked me.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: What's the matter? Am I not supposed to be here?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: N-No, that's not what I meant. It's just... I don't usually see you around this time.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's not often you step outside that workshop of yours when it's not lunch or dinnertime.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sometimes you don't even come out to eat, and I couldn't drag you out of there no matter how hard I try.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't exaggerate. I come outside for fresh air sometimes.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Also, if I ever see you in my lab with your outside shoes, I'll snatch your entrance permission.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: R-Right, I'll keep that in mind!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Also.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Also?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Could you at least... wear your clothes right? Look how messed up you got here.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Huh? My clothes? Where? Here?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you doing? Wait, stop pulling so hard. You're making it worse!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I can't take this... Stop! I'll fix it for you!
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hehe, thanks.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're way too sensitive about this stuff, you know that? You even managed to get Closure to wash her hands after work. That's no easy feat...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, right, perfect timing. Weedy, you're good with the book studying stuff, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I do research... Does that count as studying?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Yes, of course! Why wouldn't it count?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: See, there's something I wanted to ask you about...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Now that doesn't happen every day. Go ahead.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Uh, it's actually a question about gravitational acceleration. Also, I need a formula for figuring out parasitic drag and energy expansion. You have to know this stuff, right? Mind teaching me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Huh? What's the matter? Why are you touching my forehead...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hm... Doesn't seem like you have a fever.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm surprised to see you interested in this topic.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: How strange. I thought it was sunny today? Did it start raining all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Don't be like that. It's not that I'm into it, but I don't really have a choice here. This is actually useful.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whatever, just take a look at this.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What is it...? Have you been reading this?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: This is all advanced stuff, and the questions listed here...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Sorry, I take that back.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hm? Take what back?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're actually studying hard. One cannot come up with these questions just by leafing through the book. I must apologize.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Eh? Hahaha, no need. Why so serious? I don't mind at all.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're not the only one who says stuff like that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I mean, I'm really not all that smart. It takes a lot of work to learn this stuff, and researching on stuff like that is just not my thing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But you...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I don't have a choice. There are lots of things I wanna do, so I gotta get stronger, and I'll try anything that could help me get there.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hehe, I mean, this is just studying. It's so much easier than being Ace's punching bag on the training grounds, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, so you talk about me behind my back like that?
Agh!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, I'm glad to see you so full of ginger, Blaze, but enough screwing around. You're being a bad influence on Weedy.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Ace!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hello, Ace.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I'm not being a bad influence on her. I'm just telling the truth!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: When you and Mechanist took me out for special training last time, I almost got sliced into two, right through my belly button!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, we were tuning your new weapon for you. Making it as destructive as you wanted it to be wasn't an easy thing. Mechanist spent days at his workbench just to get it done.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: You should've seen the sketches he shredded. He used so much paper, Logistics gave him an earful.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: That's not good.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But I really gotta thank him for giving me this big guy. It feels so natural while I'm slicing things up... And if it wasn't for this, I guess I wouldn't have been able to use that new technique of mine.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Look! I brought some Siracusan cheese back as souvenir. It has some really unique flavor, supposedly. I'll take some to Mechanist later.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Sniffs)
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Gross.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Haha, I can't say for sure he's going to like this...
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Oh, right, Weedy.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: It's the application you filed with Engineering the other day. We got the materials from Closure already.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: I was just about to ask...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: To be honest, I would never have thought we'd get a request like that.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: But if that's what you want, and Closure is willing to vouch for the things you make, who am I to say no?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: So, does that mean... I...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: You're a regular operator now.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Thank you...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Eh? What's going on? You want to go out into the field, Weedy?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Do you have a problem with that?
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Oh, no, of course not! I look forward to fighting with you. I'd never look down on you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's only that... well... Are you sure you can keep up?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I, too, want some change once in a while.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I may be weak, but I have certain areas I excel at. Though I may trail everyone else when it comes to physical capabilities, don't underestimate what my water cannons can do. They might just have more thrust than you do, Blaze.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Sounds reliable enough to me! If we ever go out on a mission together, I'm counting on you to have my back!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'll think about it...
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Ahem, so do you still need me to help you with those questions? If so, bring them over tonight, and I'll take a look.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: I should get going now.
attributes.name: Weedy

attributes.content: Hm? What? Is she... shy?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You should try not to say that in front of her.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Of course I won't. I've got manners.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hm... I should go back to get my mission logs in order. I had to use my new technique when things got desperate, but it feels like something was still missing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The feel? No, it's probably a numbers problem...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So that's why you checked out these advanced textbooks? I know you're not fond of formulas and numbers.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Of course I don't like them, and I've been tearing my hair out over them!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But I don't have a choice! My Arts aren't the kind you can just throw all over the place without thinking. If I want to do my job well, I have to work harder.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Haha, oh yeah? That's great. A load off my shoulders.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Right, Mechanist is working on improvements too. Be sure to talk to him. He'll take a look.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: No problem. I'll go check on him right away! And even if he keeps me knocking on his door for hours again, I'm not going to complain.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I doubt he'll put you through that. You'll get to see him pretty soon.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Has Dr. Kal'tsit talked to you about that yet?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Oh... That?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I heard you needed me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What's the matter? You seem pretty solemn. Is it something important?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yes, I think this is very important indeed, both for you and Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Well, crap. You talking like that is making me a little nervous.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, how long has it been since you came on board?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Hm... Let me see... Almost a year.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Time flies.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Time leaves us all behind.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Your growth in the past year has been apparent to all of us. Even if it wasn't your intention to prove anything with your actions, you have indeed shown us what you are capable of.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ace and many other operators all think very highly of you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Why are we talking about this all of a sudden? I'm starting to blush...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Your body temperature is normal.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm doing what I can to hold it back here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I suppose you already know what I summoned you for.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I have my guesses...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Very well. I'll get to the point.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Ever since Rhodes Island was established, we've had many members come and go. I won't say much about that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We welcome those who share our ideology, but, of course, ideologies are not to be imposed on anyone.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That said... We need members who can walk this journey with us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Blaze, it's natural if you aren't ready, and none of us will force you to do anything.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if you are ready...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Come to the lower deck of the bridge and open the door to the left of the stairs. We will be waiting for you there.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: That's what she said...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ace, do you know what Dr. Kal'tsit was talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You really need me to tell you? I thought you said you had your guesses?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: I do, but... I don't know for sure.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There are only so many things that Dr. Kal'tsit would talk to me about, especially all formally like that.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So I guess maybe she's giving me a chance to do what you do?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: More or less. Looks like you know the score.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: I'm not stupid.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, how should I put this? It's like a dream. It doesn't feel real.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Like, I've never thought of myself as stronger than anyone else here. I still have a ways to go to match any of you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze, you—
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Oh, Blaze, there you are!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've been looking for you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm? Oh, it's the little rabbit!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're looking for me? Hey, careful. Don't trip... Look how bouncy you are! You're just a delight!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Eh? B-Blaze, stahp squishing mah face!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Come on. What's the harm?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Looks like I needn't say anything then...)
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: (Amiya, I'm leaving her to you.)
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Well then, I'll see you later.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Huh? Wait, Ace...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: He's gone. Where's the fire?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ace probably still has work to finish.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: R-Right, Blaze! Have you eaten yet? The cafeteria made your favorite stir-fry today. Would you like to go together?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Also, I borrowed the CD you said you liked from Operator Elysium... Want to listen to it together?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Whoa, you mean his favorite? Of course!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But... What's the matter, little rabbit? You seem way too enthusiastic today.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmm... Is it obvious?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Super obvious!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Um, sorry, Blaze... I overheard your conversation with Ace...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm? Oh...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't worry so much about that. Smile. Yep, that's right. Turn the frown upside down. There's no need to apologize. I wasn't trying to hide anything anyway.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Well, you heard it yourself. I have a good idea why Dr. Kal'tsit wants to see me.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If my hunch is correct, you probably know what this is about, right, Amiya?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Were you trying to cheer me up because you were worried it was giving me too much stress? You're so cute, Amiya!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Please stop saying that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay, I'll knock it off. Let's get serious.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm really not that confident in myself, and I really think I have a ways to go, too.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Look, the thing is... if I didn't have the weapon that Mechanist designed, I don't think I could've been any help to my team at all.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I mean it, Amiya. Can I really do it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: When I heard you ask Ace just now, I thought I had to tell you how I feel...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm listening, Amiya. I always listen to what you have to say.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Are you working hard because you're trying to earn some kind of title, Blaze?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Right? Blaze, you're putting in so much work not to become something. It's actually the opposite. It's because you are who you are that we think you are the right person for the job...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And everyone trusts you already, don't they?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone who came back from the mission in Siracusa told me this—
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'It's all thanks to Blaze.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: 'If it wasn't for her cutting open that wall, we couldn't have finished the mission.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: T-That doesn't say anything about me. It's all thanks to what Mechanist gave me...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But no one else could've used such massive equipment as well as you did.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Uhh...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If it wasn't for you, Ace might've gone with a safer plan.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: See? Everyone trusts you, and you are an inseparable part of the team now. This is the most important thing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm just trying to say—We aren't giving you the title so that you can take the job.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's your own actions that decided all of this, Blaze. You chose to become a certain kind of person, and you have chosen to take on that responsibility.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If all we wanted was combat capability, we could've asked somebody else. If we wanted a big pile of muscle, we didn't have to ask you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Does that mean what I think it means?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Uh, no, probably not...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I-I'm just trying to say that strength isn't the only thing Rhodes Island is looking for!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You should believe in yourself, Blaze, and believe in us!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you've made your decision, I'm ready to go with you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay, okay... Sheesh, my whole face is going red.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Enough, little rabbit. I know what you're trying to say.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're right. Jeez, you really have a way with words.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ehehe...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Okay, it's almost time. I gotta pull it together and go to my meeting now.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I've never once thought of running away, you know?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, I-I'll come with you!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Great! Let's take a relaxing walk together. How come you look like you're more nervous than I am?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: D-Do I...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yep. Smile! That frown ruins your cute little face.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Nn... hehe.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There we go.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Trust me. I won't disappoint you.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze walks down the long, dim hallway. The light above her head gently sways as the landship continues its march forward, causing her shadow on the ground to waver side to side as well.
Amiya has accompanied her on the entire journey to this door.
Then she swings it open.
The staircase leading down is long and dark, as though truly bottomless. Blaze takes a deep breath and begins her descent, leaving Amiya behind.
She must walk the rest of the way by herself.
At the bottom of the staircase, Blaze can make out a long table in a room that structurally seems cold as ice, with a warm, yellow light casting upon its steel beams.
A few familiar figures, some less so, stand under the lamplight.
From the shadows, a person that Blaze is all too familiar with steps forward, just as she expected her to.
Here you are.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I expected this to be a formal event, but this is quite the party...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Both Ace and Mechanist. Uh... and this is... Logos?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We're not exchanging cards...
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: Now I feel so much more relaxed with you guys here. I was pretty scared when I opened the door.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I recommended you for the job, so of course I'm here.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Ha, I didn't know you were such a coward.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Easy for you to say from that side of the table!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay, enough. Let's get down to business, and once this is done, come with me to the workshop. I want to tune that guy for you a little more.
attributes.name: Mechanist

attributes.content: Okay, I got a present for you, too.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Come on, stop interrupting.
attributes.name: Ace

attributes.content: Let's get started.
attributes.name: Logos

attributes.content: To brass tacks, then.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Frontline Combat Squad, Team Ace, Blaze.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: With everyone in this room as witnesses, I need to know how you feel, and what your decision is.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Operator Blaze, will you become one of Rhodes Island's elite operators?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit
